page.title: 11School Domesday Group.
page.content: This survey was begun by twenty children in class 3 of Marden Primary School. The idea was to generate a picture of our block by beginning with the nucleus of the village of Marden and then to fan outwards to include a number of features characteristic of this area, at present. Maps were duplicated, material perused and log books prepared for our own individual records of our researches and activities. Unfortunately we mis-judged the depth and content of the programme. We also mis-judged the disruptive affect of the normal school life to which we were committed. A week in France and the attendant preparations, Galas, Fetes, Sports Days, a week's music festival, an end of term concert and the departure of older children, ground us to a halt.
